title: my league wont open after i get into a game
body: Hey guys so for some reason my league game doesn't come up after I go into a game. So what I mean is that after I choose my champ, the league just goes blank after we're about to go into a game. Please help!!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, not getting into a game after Champ Select doesn't have an immediate root cause.  It could indicate that you aren't able to connect to the individual Game Server, or your computer isn't able to launch the actual program.  

In an effort to rule out different root causes, make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  It has the most common solutions to the game not appearing after Champ Select.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
